tree.name: Corey Kispert
tree.tradeDescription: Hawks acquire CJ McCollum and Corey Kispert for Trae Young

assetsGivenUp.name: Trae Young
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Draft night swap: Hawks selected Luka Doncic #3, traded him to Dallas for the #5 pick (Trae Young) and a 2019 protected 1st rounder

assetsGivenUp.name: 2018 #3 Overall Pick
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Hawks selected Doncic #3 overall, immediately traded to Dallas in swap for #5 pick (Trae Young)
assetsGivenUp.note: Slovenian prodigy, became 5x All-Star with Mavericks
